Plot: Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez's homage to exploitation double features in the 60s and 70s with two back-to-back cult films that include previews of coming attractions between them.
Title: Grindhouse
Writer: Robert Rodriguez, Rob Zombie, Edgar Wright, Jeff Rendell, Eli Roth, Quentin Tarantino, Rob Cotterill (story), Jason Eisener (story), John Davies (fake trailer segment "Hobo with a Shotgun")
Actors: Kurt Russell, Zoë Bell, Rosario Dawson, Vanessa Ferlito
tomatoConsensus: Grindhouse delivers exhilarating exploitation fare with wit and panache, improving upon its source material with feral intelligence.
Director: Robert Rodriguez, Eli Roth, Quentin Tarantino, Edgar Wright, Rob Zombie
